title: Sabor Natura
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Pizza, International, Organic, Buffet, Juice bar, Take-out
description: Vegetarian restaurant serving a large amount of soy based options. Has vegan options. Serves rice and beans daily, many salads, pastries, cookies, breads and little pies. Often pasta/pizza options. Family-friendly. Complimentary green tea upon leaving.
streetAddress: Avienda Rio Branco 1726 Loja 11, Praia do Canto
